about_the_game:
This is TREASURE STAR, the game in the spirit of Zelda 1 where you control Animo, a treasure hunter who faces a new adventure in searching for the long-lost Confederate Gold. What he wasn't expecting, were the secrets of this treasure, and the forces that also want to take it. Will Animo be able to find the treasure? Only your skill can answer that question. Go find the TREASURE STAR hero!

Remember YOU are the one that has to find the Treasure. Find clues leading to it, because no one will outright tell you where to go. That's the magic of Treasure Star.

  • Explore an open land with pure freedom, just like the Legend of Zelda for the NES! Remember that it's dangerous to go alone.
  • Challenge 9 dungeons, each one with their own mechanics. The secrets that are hidden in the hearts of these places are up to you to find!
  • Time is your friend. Traverse it with a special mechanic...
  • Become the first one that reaches this long-lost treasure and become a legend.
detailed_description:
This is TREASURE STAR, the game in the spirit of Zelda 1 where you control Animo, a treasure hunter who faces a new adventure in searching for the long-lost Confederate Gold. What he wasn't expecting, were the secrets of this treasure, and the forces that also want to take it. Will Animo be able to find the treasure? Only your skill can answer that question. Go find the TREASURE STAR hero!

Remember YOU are the one that has to find the Treasure. Find clues leading to it, because no one will outright tell you where to go. That's the magic of Treasure Star.

  • Explore an open land with pure freedom, just like the Legend of Zelda for the NES! Remember that it's dangerous to go alone.
  • Challenge 9 dungeons, each one with their own mechanics. The secrets that are hidden in the hearts of these places are up to you to find!
  • Time is your friend. Traverse it with a special mechanic...
  • Become the first one that reaches this long-lost treasure and become a legend.

  • Processor: 2 GB RAM
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM

short_description: TREASURE STAR! Is an adventure game inspired by the first Legend of Zelda for the NES and the movies of Indiana Jones to create a game with an emphasis on exploration. Go back to the '80s, travel in time, and make your way to a treasure lost in time.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
